title: League wont open the installer on a new PC
body: So when I go try to download league and run the .exe immeditaly 3 boxes will flash on my screen and then this will show up in my task manager "LeagueofLegends_NA_Installer_2016_05_13.exe This installer database contains the logic and data required to install League of Legends. (32 bit)" I can install games on steam and such but this just wont work. Any help would be great!

replies.body:
This might be caused by a permissions setting blocking game files from being accessed.  What happens if you run the installer as Admin instead?

If that helps, you may need to run through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure access is being allowed.
